alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Louisa; Muscatine; Scott; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:40PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Rock Island, west central Scott, southeastern Washington, Muscatine, northwestern Louisa and southeastern Johnson Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 439 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Atalissa to near Ainsworth. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Atalissa around 445 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Muscatine, Wilton, Columbus Junction, Columbus City, Conesville, Walcott, Letts and Fruitland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with the stronger storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Illinois...and southeastern and east central Iowa.
